name: Shrek's Vacation
summary: With three busy ogre babies at home, Shrek finds himself a very tired ogre dad. He decides that the family needs a vacation, so he and Fiona pack up the babies and head to the great outdoors in this adventure for the V.Reader from VTech. The trip doesn't go as planned when Donkey tags along. With 8 reading games and activities included, children will build core reading skills in compound words, parts of speech, order of events and so much.
